title: Launching Playlist View - Tapping Video-Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a team page
and taps on a video in the video carousel 
(anywhere but the un-mute button)
custom_expected:
Then the playlist view will launch
and the video which was tapped, will be playing at the top
and will be un-muted

title: Launching Playlist View - See All-Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a team page
and taps on "See All" from the video carousel
custom_expected:
Then the playlist view will launch
and the first video in the list will be playing at the top
and will be un-muted

title: Playlist View - Now Playing Video-Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and views the Now Playing video
custom_expected: Then the user will see the video's title, duration, date published, and description

title: Playlist View - Video List-Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a list of videos below the now playing video
and the videos will include a thumbnail, duration, title, and date published

title: Playlist View - Scrolling Video List- Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and scrolls the video list
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to scroll til the end of the video list
and the now playing video will remain static and will continue to play undisturbed

title: Now Playing Video Controls-Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

X to dismiss
Picture in Picture (iOS 14 only)
Mute button
Pause button
Scrubber with time lapsed and time left
Closed Caption button
Full Screen button

title: Now Playing - Tapping X - Auto
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the X button
custom_expected: Then the video will stop

title: Now Playing - Picture in Picture
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on a iOS device
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Picture in Picture button
custom_expected: Then the video will continue to play in picture in picture

title: Now Playing - Mute
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Mute button
custom_expected: Then the video will mute

title: Now Playing - Un-Mute
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and has muted the video
and taps the Un-mute button
custom_expected: Then the video will un-mute

title: Now Playing - Pause
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Pause button
custom_expected: Then the video will pause

title: Now Playing - Play After Pause
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and has Paused the video
and taps the Play button
custom_expected: Then the video will resume playback

title: Now Playing - Scrubber
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and adjusts the scrubber
custom_expected:
Then the video will play from the position the scrubber was moved to
and the time lapsed and time left will adjust accordingly

title: Now Playing - Closed Caption
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Closed Caption button
custom_expected:
Then the Closed Caption button will be highlighted
and captions will begin to appear on the screen

title: Now Playing - Disabling Closed Caption
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and has enabled Closed Caption
and taps the highlighted Closed Caption button
custom_expected:
Then the Closed Caption button will no longer be highlighted
and captions will stop appearing on the screen

title: Now Playing - Full Screen
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Full Screen button
custom_expected:
Then the user will exit the playlist view
and the video will continue playing in fullscreen and landscape mode

title: Playlist View - Continuous Playback
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and views the Now Playing video 
and allows it to play til its end
custom_expected:
Then the next video in the list will begin to play atop the view
and the list will scroll up to show the now playing video at the top of the list
and the new video's information (title, duration, date, description) will appear below the player

title: Playlist View - Continuous Playback (Lite User)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user does not have any entitlements
custom_steps:
When the user is on the playlist view
after having launched it from the Team Page
and views the Now Playing video 
and allows it to play til its end
custom_expected:
Then the next video in the list will begin to play atop the view
and will start off with a pre-roll ad
and the list will scroll up to show the now playing video at the top of the list
and the new video's information (title, duration, date, description) will appear below the player

title: Playlist View - Selecting New Video

When the user is on the playlist view

title: Countdown Screen - Play Again

after having launched it from the Team Page
and taps on the Now Playing video to bring up the video controls
and taps the Full Screen button
and is playing the video in full screen/landscape mode
and allows the video to play til its end
and is viewing the countdown screen

custom_expected: Then the video will start playing again

custom_expected: Then the next video in the list will start to play after the 5 seconds
